label: Curb Weight
description: The weight of the vehicle without occupants

label: GVWR
description: Gross Vehicle Weight Rating is is the maximum operating weight of a vehicle as specified by the manufacturer including fuel

label: GCVWR
description: Gross Vehicle Weight Rating is the he maximum weight of a loaded vehicle and its attached loaded trailer

label: Payload
description: Payload is the carrying capacity of the vehicle. It is the GVWR minus the curb weight

label: Towing Capacity
description: Is the maximum allowable weight that a vehicle can tow. Towing capacity is specified by the v­ehicle manufacturer and can usually be found in the owner’s manual
